strings.Value: "This Lander Lebeda... He's a shady fellow! I wouldn't risk setting out on a crusade with him."
"You're just realizing that now?! I don't know what's more amazing — the fact that you see this about him right away, or the fact I can still be surprised by people's naivete..."
"When an animal flees its own pack, it's been chased away. When a man sets out on his own, he's running only from himself…"
"Ha. His vile intent was written in red upon his forehead. I've seen enough such adventurers in the courts of Kyonin. But I suppose this only makes it easier to use him for our benefit..."
